title.narrative: Doh Eain - City for People and Sustainable Bank St

description.narrative: Promotion of sustainable urban planning based on Danish green solutions to the Yangon municipal authorities and the public through targeted high-level lectures and dialogue meetings and through the upgrade and renewal of Bank Street in central Yangon, making it a people-centred green space that incorporates Danish green solutions.

title.narrative: Yangon City Authorities, relevant stakeholders and local residents are better informed of the practices for sustainable urban planning and green cities.

description.narrative: Increased awareness of the stakeholders who get involved in the project’s events by conducting pre and post event surveys.
